dataTemplate.name: FI_SEVEN_DAY_NO_RELEASE_SHEET_SCHEDULE
dataTemplate.description: Seven Day No Release Sheet Schedule Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT l.location_xid location_id, l.location_name FROM location l CROSS JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT(a.source_location_gid) location_id FROM shipment a INNER JOIN shipment_status b ON a.shipment_gid = b.shipment_gid WHERE (a.start_time >= SYSDATE AND a.start_time <= SYSDATE + 7) AND b.status_type_gid='SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE' AND b.status_value_gid!='SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_COMPLETED' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT v.process_control_request_id, v.warehouse_id FROM process_control_request pr CROSS JOIN (SELECT pr1.process_control_request_id, SUBSTR((SELECT SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'P_WAREHOUSE_GID=')+16) FROM process_control_request WHERE TOPIC_CLASS_NAME='glog.server.workflow.adhoc.ScheduleReportTopic' AND process_control_request_id=pr1.process_control_request_id), 0, INSTR((SELECT SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'P_WAREHOUSE_GID=')+16) FROM process_control_request WHERE TOPIC_CLASS_NAME='glog.server.workflow.adhoc.ScheduleReportTopic' AND process_control_request_id=pr1.process_control_request_id),'&')-1) warehouse_id FROM process_control_request pr1 WHERE NOT pr1.next_process_time IS NULL) v WHERE pr.process_control_request_id = v.process_control_request_id AND NOT v.warehouse_id IS NULL AND a.source_location_gid = v.warehouse_id) UNION SELECT DISTINCT(a.dest_location_gid) location_id FROM shipment a INNER JOIN shipment_status b ON a.shipment_gid = b.shipment_gid WHERE (a.end_time >= SYSDATE AND a.end_time <= SYSDATE + 7) AND b.status_type_gid='SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE' AND b.status_value_gid!='SCOULAR/FOOD.ENROUTE_COMPLETED' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT v.process_control_request_id, v.warehouse_id FROM process_control_request pr CROSS JOIN (SELECT pr1.process_control_request_id, SUBSTR((SELECT SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'P_WAREHOUSE_GID=')+16) FROM process_control_request WHERE TOPIC_CLASS_NAME='glog.server.workflow.adhoc.ScheduleReportTopic' AND process_control_request_id=pr1.process_control_request_id), 0, INSTR((SELECT SUBSTR(topic_parameters, INSTR(topic_parameters,'P_WAREHOUSE_GID=')+16) FROM process_control_request WHERE TOPIC_CLASS_NAME='glog.server.workflow.adhoc.ScheduleReportTopic' AND process_control_request_id=pr1.process_control_request_id),'&')-1) warehouse_id FROM process_control_request pr1 WHERE NOT pr1.next_process_time IS NULL) v WHERE pr.process_control_request_id = v.process_control_request_id AND NOT v.warehouse_id IS NULL AND a.dest_location_gid = v.warehouse_id) ORDER BY location_id) loc WHERE l.location_gid = loc.location_id
